attributes.value: Sees friendship as one of the finer things in life
Finds herself somewhat disgusted with eloquent speakers
Values artwork
Doesn't respect a society that has settled into harmony without debate and strife
Values martial prowess
Finds the pursuit of skill mastery off-putting
Thinks that the entire concept of sacrifice for others is truly disgusting
Respects perseverance
Treasures leisure time and thinks it is very important in life
Values knowledge
Is quick to form negative views about things
Tends to be a little wasteful when working on projects
Doesn't mind a little tumult and discord in day-to-day living
Is quite polite
Is generally quite confident of her abilities when undertaking specific ventures
Takes no pleasure in her talents and appearance
Thinks she is fairly important in the grand scheme of things
Generally acts with a narrow focus on the current activity
Generally finds herself quite hopeful about the future
Is curious and eager to learn
Shares intimate details of life without sparing a thought to repercussions or propriety
Is frustratingly sloppy and careless with every task she sets to carry out
Tends to be a bit stubborn in changing her mind about things
Forms strong emotional bonds with others, at times to her detriment
Dislikes obligations and will try to avoid being bound by them
Is sloppy with her living space
Has an active imagination
Very agile
Quick to tire
Slow to heal
Meager creativity
Very good intuition
Little linguistic ability
A questionable spatial sense
